alert.note: Alert for Bristol; Eastern Kent; Newport; Northwest Providence; Southeast Providence; Washington; Western Kent (Rhode Island) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 18 at 7:56AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Windham, northeastern Tolland, southern Worcester, southwestern Norfolk, south central Middlesex, east central Hampden, west central Bristol, northern Washington, northwestern Newport, Kent, Providence and western Bristol Counties through 900 AM EDT... At 755 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Brookfield to Sterling to near Mystic. Movement was northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Minor flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor nuisance flooding of typically flood prone areas. Locations impacted include... Worcester, Providence, Warwick, Cranston, Pawtucket, East Providence, Woonsocket, Marlborough, Shrewsbury, Coventry, Cumberland, North Providence, Franklin, South Kingstown, West Warwick, Johnston, North Attleborough, Milford, North Kingstown, and Plainfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams.

area.areaDesc: Bristol; Eastern Kent; Newport; Northwest Providence; Southeast Providence; Washington; Western Kent
